description: i love this app. Is a waste of resources to having a browser tab for quick translates or misspelling, ever to consult articles from wikipedia while working. this browser doesn't consume your ram or drain your battery

As far as I know, this is the lightest graphical browser out there. It doesn't support javascript, plugins, nor even the latest CSS and HTML standards. Still, many websites will display adequately. Because of dillo's simplicity, it may be a good way to avoid tracking and security problems associated with the modern web.

The UI is simple. It is dated, but that's not a problem -- especially if you pine for the early web browsers!

Javascript does no work with this browser.
Can't read or misreads the date of SSC certificates.
HTML 5 not supported.
userAgent does not say which browser engine it uses.
:o(
no javascript. even fb can not be loaded properly

This browser takes up barely any resources (something like 30M of RAM), web pages load incredibly quickly! It is missing some features like floating elements which makes some websites look strange but that is one of the developers key points of focus and should be added somewhat soon. Don't expect to run web apps with this browser but also, don't use web apps. Overall excellent browser!
wonderful it's changed my life
summary: Makes me want to run for BOS in AZ

description: it's neat, but it does not load gitlab.com
Es un navegador muy simple, funcional. Los sitios modernos no se muestran correctamente. Creo muestra sitios bien que tengan html 4.x

WOW ! I took this for a test drive on my Pinephone running Mobian. This is not a mobile device browser, so it is awkward on here.. But I am amazed at the SPEED.!
Click on it, and you are there.
*Please add mobile device support.!

Just what I was looking for, nice little browser with no javascript carp so I can just read the text and see the tables, etc.

Pages these days have masses of javascript in, this is a welcome find, especially if like me you didn't want a terminal based browser (sorry, not that hardcore - converted Windows person here!).

Very primitive browser. I dont even understand the need for such browser. I thought this will be a good choice for my antique laptop and after trying it out i was very dissapointed. Surprisingly brave web browser works better on my old laptop.
CANT LOAD SITES
I wanted a light browser without GPU involved and not downloading the full KDE experience in Gnome. Well, this one seems to do it so far.
summary: No GPU, no KDE, just fine

description:
as others have stated (fun to see a commentfield that's coherent and with recent ppl reviewing): it's not here for the canvas javascript etc. etc. "don't expect to run webapps, but also don't used webapps" was like. hilariously on point --- for the philosophy of this web-browser, as i garner it.

now for web-devs to allow plaintext sites that don't wall out information for those of us with no interest in giving unwarranted info away...
does not render correctly on most sites. popup cert problems every site. save yourself move on....
Hab ihn 2 Jahre benutzt

Dillo ist ein sehr schlanker und schneller Browser, keine Frage. Aber wozu man ihn würde einsetzen wollen, ist mir unklar. Er zeigt Webseiten nicht so an, wie die entsprechenden CSS-Dateien das vorgeben, stellt sie andererseits aber auch nicht als reinen Text ohne grafische Gestaltung dar.
Da frage ich mich, was dieser Browser nun eigentlich will oder wozu ich ihn genau einsetzen sollte.
Kurzum: Nicht Fisch, nicht Fleisch.
tiene a su favor que es muy rapido, pero para usarlo con protocolos actuales, una cagada como los gobernantes en el cenado.
No se que buscan con esta distribución.
summary: No sirve para el siglo XXI

description: Búsqueda de imágenes inmediata. Información concreta, sin florituras. Nada de anuncios.
summary: Liviano. Lo tengo instalado desde siempre

description: Es excelente para aquellas personas que valoramos más la información escrita de las páginas web.
summary: Es mucho más que simple, extra simple. Me encantó

description:
Un navigateur très rapide et léger. Utile pour tester la visibilité d'un site sur la toile, tous navigateurs graphiques confondus.

Mais trop longtemps laissé sans mise à jour. Si Firefox ESR, la version stabilisée du navigateur de Mozilla, reçoit jusqu'à une dizaine de mises à jour par an, Dillo n'en a visiblement pas reçu de puis 2015. En matière de sécurité c'est quand même moyen.

Si le projet est toujours actif, il est trop stable pour paraître vivant. C'est d'autant plus frustrant que Dillo est l'un des meilleurs navigateurs web libres qui ne sont basés ni sur Chromium ni sur Firefox.

Все таки без современного ксс конвейера саты выглядят как хз что, но как GUEвая альтернатива lynx - выглядит огонь. Для других целей не вижу смысла его использовать. (Только если разработчики доведут конвейер до ума и научатся строить dom деревья).
Дерьмо собачье, не работающее.

Вечно просит сохранит сертификат. Веб содержимое страниц не загружает совсем или по каким то причинам нет доступа.
среди сайтов есть есть те которые открываются но их немного.
Не доделан остались не решённые задачи.
В общем то в интернет выходит, но попробовал 2гис открыть им, он не справился)) Остальное пока не пробовал
